Reference

All functions

clonewars-package

The 'clonewars' package.

compare_priors()

Visually compare normal, student_t, cauchy, laplace, and product_normal.

disp_estimates

Data to generate dispersal predictions for a given line and log(number of aphids).

fit_lines()

Fit multiple time series for multiple aphid lines.

impute()

Impute missing data.

leslie

Leslie matrices for fast and slow aphid populations.

load_data()

Load aphid growth data.

load_prior_data()

Load data that won't be used for the actual analysis, to develop priors.

make_pred_df()

Make prediction data frame from model output and the original data frame.

plant_death

Information for simulating plant death.

sim_lines()

Simulate log-transformed counts of aphid populations for one or more lines.

theta

Priors for use in estimating population parameters.
